Checkers Plus is the new checkers games for tablet and smartphone by Spaghetti Interactive, it's FREE on Google Play Store!

You can play with your friends or challenge other online players!

Main features:

✪ Multiplayer and Single mode with 3 skill levels
✪ Random mode: in few instants you will be matched against a random opponent
✪ ROOMS full of opponents!
✪ Chat with emoticons during game
✪ MONTHLY LEADERBOARDS: the best players will be published on the web site
✪ Several Variants: Italian, International, English, Brazilian, Spanish, Canadian and Russian
✪ Custom skins for backgrounds and tokens
✪ Landscape and portrait mode
✪ Sharing of victories, levels and achievements
✪ FRIENDS LIST inside the game!
✪ Login with Facebook, Google, Windows Live and email
✪ Custom profile picture
✪ 27 Achievements for an enduring gameplay
✪ 60 levels to reach the top!
✪ Statistics to monitor your progress
✪ ELO system as in the real systems!

JOIN OTHER PLAYERS AND REACH THE TOP OF THE LEADERBOARDS!

selected plan

purchase

of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal

title: Checkers Plus - Board Games

creator: Spaghetti Interactive Srl
descriptionHtml:
Play Chess Plus online completely free, your enjoyment is guaranteed! Private messages, chat, monthly trophies, badges, personal statistics and much more awaits you!

Compete for the monthly leaderboards in the multiplayer mode or play for fun and meet new people in the social mode. You can also challenge your friends… or single play against the PC.

Don´t wait any longer and join our fun community with millions of players all around the world.

Develop your playing ability even more with:
• 100 skill levels
• 3 levels of difficulty in single player mode
• 27 badges to win
• Playing statistics to check on your progress
• Offline mode to play when you're travelling or stuck with no reception

If you are more the competitive type:
• Play the ranked multiplayer mode
• Compete for the monthly and global leaderboards and win one of our trophies
• ELO system for ranking calculations just like the real world champions!

If you'd like to be more social, take advantage of:
• Private matches against friends (up to 4 players)
• Private messages with other players
• Chat to communicate with your game opponents
• Rooms to find new opponents and meet new people from all over the world
• Invites to challenge your Facebook® friends
• Internal friendships system within the game

Personalise your game freely with:
• Different graphics for chessboards, pieces and backgrounds

Play from your smartphone or tablet, in horizontal or vertical mode, Chess Plus will win you over with its speed, fluidity and precision. You will feel as if you´re playing with your friends! Start playing directly in single player mode without even registering, or log in via Facebook®, Google® or email to play the social and competitive matches!

Remember that you can play Chess Plus completely free.

Subscription: "Upgrade to Gold" to remove ads and unlocking other features like uploading your own profile pic and having access to an unlimited number of private messages, friends, blocked users and recent opponent list.

Length: 1 week or 1 month
Price: €1,49 per week or €3,99 per month

The payment will be charged directly to your Google® account once the purchase is confirmed. it will be up for renewal within 24h prior to the end of the current period and will identify the cost of renewal. The auto-renewal can be turned off in your account settings after its first purchase.

Give our Gold subscription a try with our 7 day free trial.

These prices are for EU customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Visit www.spaghetti-interactive.it and find all our fun classic Italian card games: scopa, briscola, burraco, scopone, tressette, traversone, rubamazzo, assopiglia and scala40. You will also find other board games like checkers!

Join our Facebook® community on https://www.facebook.com/spaghettiinteractive

For support, email supporto@spaghetti-interactive.it
Terms and conditions: https://www.scacchipiu.it//terms_conditions.html
Privacy policy: https://www.scacchipiu.it/privacy.html

NOTE: the game is aimed at an adult audience and it is NOT categorised as a real betting game, it is not possible to win real money or prizes by using this app. Playing Chess Plus often does not correspond with a real advantage in betting sites where this game can be found.
